      • isPiecePresent

        public boolean isPiecePresent(int row,
                              int col)
        Piece present method
        Parameters:
        row - the row that the current piece is on
        col - the column that the current piece is on
        Returns:
        boolean true or false whether the piece is present at this row and and column in the board

      • isPathBlocked

        public boolean isPathBlocked(int currRow,
                             int currCol,
                             int tarRow,
                             int tarCol)
        Method to check is path blocked or not
        Parameters:
        currRow - the row that the current piece is on
        currCol - the column that the current piece is on
        tarRow - the row that the current piece wants to move on
        tarCol - the column that the current piece wants to move on
        Returns:
        boolean true or false whether the path is blocked or not

      • isKingUnderCheck

        public boolean isKingUnderCheck(int kingRow,
                                int kingCol,
                                boolean isWhiteTurn,
                                boolean checkForOpponentKing)
        Method to check is king under check or not
        Parameters:
        kingRow - the row where the king piece is currently on
        kingCol - the column where the king piece is currently on
        isWhiteTurn - true or false whether it is white turn or not
        checkForOpponentKing - true or false
        Returns:
        boolean true or false whether the openent king is under check or not
